forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 46F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
